Articles.Content:
This is the ship that brought me to Duna for my first time, it's a 1 man craft. It has 6 fuel tanks to bring it into a 100 km orbit and 6 SRBs to help it off the launch pad, from there it has one large fueltank and a NERVA to get it to Duna orbit and deorbit, a parachute to help at landing as well as an engine. It didn't slow my framerate at all so don't worry about that too much.

Edited May 11, 2013 by Polar Bear
